hotels.title: Chinese Oceanfront Glamour in Hainan with Palm-Lined Lagoon Pool
hotels.description: Escape to the tropics at Hyatt Regency Hainan Ocean Paradise Resort, where family-friendly fun meets laidback coastal luxury. Set on the sun-soaked Hainan Island, this resort is a gateway to aquatic adventures, with direct access to Hainan R&F Ocean Paradise theme park and just moments from Tianya Haijiao’s iconic seaside rocks. Start your day with a generous international buffet at Market Café, then unwind by the sprawling pool or grab a drink at the poolside bar. Walk along the beach, stay active in the fitness centre or discover nearby cultural sites before ending the day with sunset views at The Lounge.
